column5: just wanted to share some pics and say hi, I had a great hardwater season and couldn't believe my success this season, not only did i catch some nice fish, i also found an unexpected fishing partner.   After watching me prepare for the next mornings outing my girlfriend said i can't understand why u like fishing when u freeze ur butt off,  i replied with  the usual it's only cold till i find the perch then into the portable, about 100 ?'s later she is joining me on an outting.  well i can only wish everyone's 1st time fishing is something close to this, 1 hole each and fish after fish all day and she was hooked.  Well the other day after watching the motogp(i know i'm lucky) she said hey u know how the season closes on ...as she named off a few species...y do they only let ppl catch them during the winter?  well after i told her they open up again she asked y don't u fish in summer, don't u know how? being a guy i made up this excuse about how i worked in this certain industry that was slow in winter and busy the rest of the time so i never had a chance....and now u know y i'm here...haha i know the deal as having lurked a lil.lol    and lady luck herself    ah hell pike's open in some areas here's some pike porn.lol that saying is new to me    looking fwd to posting some softwater pics.
Welcome aboard!
